LanguageData.FT_BlocksConcrete.label: concrete blocks
LanguageData.FT_BlocksConcrete.description: Blocks of solid concrete. Concrete is a nice building material but terriable at looking.
LanguageData.FT_ReinforcedConcreteBag.label: reinforced concrete
LanguageData.FT_ReinforcedConcreteBag.description: bags of solid concrete powder with steel bars. Concrete is a strong building material but ugly to look at.
LanguageData.FT_WoodConcrete.label: fiber concrete plank
LanguageData.FT_WoodConcrete.description: a mixture of cloth and concrete made into plank-shaped, able to make things which wood can make, but even better because it is more durable and fire-proofed
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteCompressed.label: Packed Concrete
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteCompressed.description: Bags of solid concrete dust.they are packed-ready for storage or trade.
